## Block.getSurroundParent() method

Return the parent block that surrounds the current block, or null if this block has no surrounding block. A parent block might just be the previous statement, whereas the surrounding block is an if statement, while loop, etc.  The block (if any) that surrounds the current block.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getSurroundParent(): this | null;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

this \| null
